attributes.action: Pay carers allowance to carers who are on their state pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My Wife gave up her job to take care of an elderly relative -for this she received carers allowance of £43 per week
She has just turned 60 years old and receives her State Pension of £63 per week-She now loses her carers allowance so she now has to fund the costs of caring from her State Pension
THIS IS UNJUST AND MORALY WRONG

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
